column10: Relatively new crosswalk at this location is on a curve with very limited visibility, particularly for people driving north towards Blake. Pedestrians crossing east to west must enter roadway/bike lane in order to gain visibility to cars approaching's around the curve at high speeds. Have witnessed several near misses (some involving children) at this location - myself included. Frequently used access point to Blake Lane Park.
